snippet: The number of rigs drilling for oil and natural gas in the United States has fallen to the lowest level since at least the 1940s.
abstract: Baker Hughes reports number of rigs for drilling oil and natural gas in United States has fallen to lowest level in 70 years.
lead_paragraph: The number of rigs drilling for oil and natural gas in the United States has fallen to the lowest level since at least the 1940s.

headline.main: Oil and Natural Gas Drilling Rigs Hit 70-Year Low
headline.print_headline: Oil and Natural Gas Drilling Rigs Hit 70-Year Low
